name: fullstackopenpart3
description: exercises for part 3 in Helsinki Unis Full Stack Open MOOC

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ./frontend && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../
scripts.deploy: git push heroku master && heroku open
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy

author: cleisti
